title: WTB Lot 149 in REA Souvenir Cleveland PC
author: pete zouras

posts.post_title: WTB Lot 149 in REA Souvenir Cleveland PC
posts.post_content: If the winner of 1905 Souvenir Postcard Shop of Cleveland Collection (7) is willing to sell Turner card please contact me with price.  Thanks
I would also be interested in almost any cards from this lot (except Turner :) ) if the high bidder is inclined.
